title: How to Get Rid of Acne and Maintain Clear Skin | Neutrogena®
description:
When treating acne spots, you are only treating the breakouts that you see, not what is forming underneath acne-prone skin. Acne can form weeks before it appears on your face.

The solution to treating acne, and preventing acne? Neutrogena® Rapid Clear® Stubborn Acne Leave-On Mask, with benzoyl peroxide, applying a thin layer on skin once a day helps to fight acne and keep skin clear and healthy.

asset.title: How to Get Rid of Acne and Maintain Clear Skin | Neutrogena®
asset.description:
When treating acne spots, you are only treating the breakouts that you see, not what is forming underneath acne-prone skin. Acne can form weeks before it appears on your face.

The solution to treating acne, and preventing acne? Neutrogena® Rapid Clear® Stubborn Acne Leave-On Mask, with benzoyl peroxide, applying a thin layer on skin once a day helps to fight acne and keep skin clear and healthy.

For more information about Rapid Clear® Stubborn Acne Leave-On Mask, visit: http://www.neutrogena.com/product/rapid+clear+stubborn+acne-+daily+leave-on+mask.do?sortby=ourPicks.

For more skin care tips on fighting acne, and keeping clear skin, subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/neutrogena.
asset.author: Neutrogena

transcripts: Acne, you've just been treating spots when they pop up but here is the problem. You only attacking what you see. Acne can start forming under the surface of your skin weeks before you actually see or feel anything so when you only spot treat other spots can pop up often in new places. It's time to change the way you fight acne with the Neutrogena rapid clear stubborn acne leave on mask the revolutionary acne treatment that's different than your spot treatment or mask. you apply the mask to your entire face and leave it on so it can work all day the active ingredient benzoyl peroxide goes deep in the pores to kill acne causing bacteria fighting visible breakouts and the acne you can't even see yet. That means less surprised breakouts. don't just treat spots treat your entire face.
